headline: Halliburton price target lowered to $41 from $43 at Jefferies
summary: Jefferies lowered the firm’s price target on Halliburton (HAL) to $41 from $43 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. Large cap oilfield services companies are entering 2025 with continued concerns on global activity growth, says the analyst, who believes the key themes to watch include international growth, North American market activity, margins sustainability, shareholder returns and business diversification. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking
